player

Class HumanPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • player.Player
      • player.HumanPlayer

  • public class HumanPlayer
extends Player
    The class that allows human players to play by asking an IO object for all the humans decisions. This may not work for now and it is not my priority.
    Author:
    William Elliman
